LeisurewayAdventures.overview: Accommodation & Meals   Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour can be arranged for an extra cost   Day Accommodation Meals   1-2       Sentrim Amboseli Lodge     Mid-range tented camp just outside Amboseli NP   Day 1: Lunch & Dinner Included      Day 2: All Meals Included                   +8 Photos          +7 Photos          Day 1: Lunch & Dinner Included Day 2: All Meals Included     3       Lake Naivasha Crescent Camp     Mid-range tented camp at Lake Naivasha (Naivasha)     All Meals Included                   +7 Photos          +6 Photos              All Meals Included       4       Lake Nakuru Lodge     Mid-range lodge inside Lake Nakuru NP     All Meals Included                   +10 Photos          +9 Photos              All Meals Included       5-6       Tumaren Camp     Mid-range tented camp outside Laikipia Plateau     All Meals Included                   +3 Photos                   All Meals Included       7       The Ark     Mid-range lodge inside Aberdare NP     All Meals Included                   +8 Photos          +7 Photos              All Meals Included       8-9       Fairmont Mount Kenya Safari Club     Luxury resort in Nanyuki (Town)     All Meals Included                   +8 Photos          +7 Photos              All Meals Included       10      End of tour(No accommodation)      Breakfast & Lunch Included           Breakfast & Lunch Included
LeisurewayAdventures.inclusions: Excluded  International flights (From/to home) Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour Tips (Tipping guideline US$10.00 pp per day) Personal items (Souvenirs, travel insurance, visa fees, etc.) Government imposed increase of taxes and/or park fees
LeisurewayAdventures.gettingthere: Getting There         This tour starts and ends in Nairobi          This operator can help select your international flights, but you'll have to book them yourself help          Fly to/from Jomo Kenyatta Airport (NBO- Check price) in Nairobi          A transfer from and back to the airport is included          Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour can be arranged for an extra cost
